title: Fontlab font bbox size! warning.
content:
Hello friends,

When I generate my font, fontlab throws a [WARNING] The feature  
file OS/2 overrides TypoAscender and TypoDescender do not sum to the  
font bbox size!

I have not been able to completly understand this warning.

Could anyone please educate me on the implications of this warning?  
Is it serious? Any remedies?
author: richard_a
